topic.title: Discussion -- Lesson 1 Markup Language and Site Development Essentials
topic.text:
1. List three operating systems and three browsers on which HTML will function.

2. What is the purpose of a tag in markup languages?

 

Note: Initial postings should be at least 200 words. Edit carefully--make every word count. In general, I will not take points off for going over this word count unless the post is excessively long, but I do take off points for posts that are too short or that contain a lot of grammatical errors. (See Guidelines for Discussions)
